Title: Cosmic Timelines: The Age of the Universe, Earth, and Sun
Description: Travel back in time to witness the birth of the universe, the formation of our Sun, and the coalescing of Earth. This video takes you on an awe-inspiring journey, from the fiery origins of the Big Bang to the creation of our Moon. Uncover the cosmic events that shaped our history and join us in exploring the astronomical wonders that define our existence.

Scenes.VoiceOverText: The universe, an expansive tapestry, began with the Big Bang, around 13.8 billion years ago.
Scenes.Description: Visualization of the Big Bang, with galaxies
Scenes.Text: The universe began with the Big Bang around 138 billion years ago

Scenes.VoiceOverText: Our Sun, a glowing sphere of hot plasma, formed about 4.6 billion years ago, giving light to our solar system.
Scenes.Description: Formation of the Sun in a cloud of gas and dust.
Scenes.Text: Our Sun formed about 46 billion years ago giving light to our solar system

Scenes.VoiceOverText: Earth, our blue home, coalesced from cosmic dust around the same time, about 4.5 billion years ago.
Scenes.Description: The early Earth forming in the solar nebula.
Scenes.Text: Earth our blue home formed about 45 billion years ago

Scenes.VoiceOverText: The Moon, Earth's constant companion, was born from a cataclysmic impact soon after Earth's formation.
Scenes.Description: The giant impact that led to the Moon's formation.
Scenes.Text: The Moon Earths constant companion was born from a cataclysmic impact

Scenes.VoiceOverText: Uncover the secrets of our cosmic past with us. Like, share, and subscribe for more astronomical wonders.
Scenes.Description: A montage of celestial events with a call to action.
Scenes.Text: Uncover the secrets of our cosmic past with us Like share and subscribe for more astronomical wonders
